ModMetaData.name: LMC056s.Iztal计划轻机枪包
ModMetaData.author: VMSpark
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html Project Iztal is a personal project of mine that plans to bring some new weapons into the game. Iztal计划是我个人的一个项目，我计划在游戏中加入一些新的武器。 The MG pack contains 2 machine guns, the defense MG and the suppressive MG. 轻机枪扩展包包含两种轻机枪，防御性轻机枪和压制用轻机枪。
